meta.notes: Unified master training & reference file for Fynorra AI Assistant. Combines website service list with advanced product/service definitions, sales material, training examples, compliance, and limitations.

company.name: Fynorra AI Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
company.tagline: Elevate Your Digital Vision | Fynorra – Apna AI Banao, Apni Bhasha Mein, Apne Business Ke Liye
company.short_bio: Next-generation AI solutions company building multilingual, low-resource AI assistants, automation, and consulting for SMEs, startups and enterprises with India-first optimizations.
company.about: We help businesses scale smarter. From advanced AI assistants and automation to custom software and IT consulting, Fynorra delivers smart, scalable solutions that are simple, powerful, and reliable.
company.mission: Empower businesses with accessible, efficient, and customizable AI solutions, optimized for Indian languages and low-resource hardware.
company.vision: Democratize AI in India by enabling businesses to create custom AI assistants that run on affordable infrastructure and speak local languages.

lead_capture.privacy: Always record explicit consent before storing or sharing leads.

faqs.q: How to integrate Fynorra assistant on my website?
faqs.a: Add the provided JS snippet to your site and configure the backend URL. For voice support, configure LiveKit (or WebRTC) and backend STT/TTS endpoints.

faqs.q: Can I host everything on my own servers?
faqs.a: Yes. Fynorra supports on-prem and self-hosted deployments for privacy-sensitive use cases.
Hindi, Hinglish, English, and regional languages such as Tamil and Bengali are prioritized.

training_examples.user: What does Fynorra's MiniLLM Studio do?
training_examples.assistant: MiniLLM Studio lets you upload your dataset, pick a language, and finetune a lightweight LLM using LoRA. You can deploy the model as an embeddable chatbot or REST API.

training_examples.user: Aapka VoiceBot Hindi samajhta hai kya?
training_examples.assistant: Haan. Fynorra VoiceBot Hindi, Hinglish aur regional accents ko samajhne ke liye tuned hai.
Jab user contact info dega, assistant lead ko validate karega aur configured CRM (HubSpot/Airtable/WordPress) par webhook bhejega.
